name: ai-hiring-platform
description: AI-powered hiring platform with backend and frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:install && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:install: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ..
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Please edit .env with your settings'
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ..
scripts.fresh:install: npm run clean:deps && npm run setup:install
